meta.name: title
meta.content: eaves Lake Forest - Apartments in Lake Forest, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.span: Value Living Welcome to eaves Lake Forest, located in Orange County, CA — where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality Lake Forest apartments with a few little extras, like generously spaced closets and well-equipped kitchens with brand name appliances. Simply put, our Lake Forest apartments for rent offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? Apartments in Lake Forest, CA No matter how you came to call Lake Forest home, you deserve an apartment where you can live comfortably. At eaves Lake Forest, that's exactly what you'll get. We offer one-, two- and three-bedroom sensible floor plans with amenities aimed at providing you a comfortable lifestyle. From barbeque and grill areas to a sparkling swimming pool and spa, you'll always love calling eaves Lake Forest home. Lake Forest Apartment Community Located in Orange County, eaves Lake Forest is a gated community conveniently located near the 5 and 405 freeways. A multitude of shopping, dining and entertainment options are available nearby as well, including Laguna Hills Mall, RED Digital Cinema and Irvine Spectrum Center. Table 1 Thai Kitchen, Aloha Hawaiian Grill and promise mouth-watering delicacies, ensuring you'll always have a place to go when you don't feel like cooking. We also offer residents a range of amenities including a fitness center, on-site laundry facilities, on-site business center, and covered parking. Plus, our technology package, eavesConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, Amazon package lockers, electronic locks, and more. About Lake Forest, CA Lake Forest is located near the Eastern Transportation Corridors, which provide easy access to Los Angeles, San Diego, and the Inland Empire. The Orange County Airport and an Amtrak station are only minutes away.

div.h2: this is the real deal. this is eaves.

a.div: Understanding what you value goes beyond offering you a quality apartment. It means having a respectful, friendly staff that you know you can depend on when you need them. Giving you one less thing to worry about and one more way to feel at home in your new community. That’s eaves.
We know you value convenience. That’s why all of our locations are also carefully selected to put you within reach of local shopping, restaurants and public transportation.

You made a promise to yourself to live within your means. That doesn't mean living without. Take advantage of our special resident discounts, early deposit refund program, and longer lease term options.

Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

better than you expected.","description":"Value Living Welcome to eaves Lake Forest, located in Orange County, CA — where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality Lake Forest apartments with a few little extras, like generously spaced closets and well-equipped kitchens with brand name appliances. Simply put, our Lake Forest apartments for rent offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? Apartments in Lake Forest, CA No matter how you came to call Lake Forest home, you deserve an apartment where you can live comfortably. At eaves Lake Forest, that's exactly what you'll get. We offer one-, two- and three-bedroom sensible floor plans with amenities aimed at providing you a comfortable lifestyle. From barbeque and grill areas to a sparkling swimming pool and spa, you'll always love calling eaves Lake Forest home. Lake Forest Apartment Community Located in Orange County, eaves Lake Forest is a gated community conveniently located near the 5 and 405 freeways. A multitude of shopping, dining and entertainment options are available nearby as well, including Laguna Hills Mall, RED Digital Cinema and Irvine Spectrum Center. Table 1 Thai Kitchen, Aloha Hawaiian Grill and promise mouth-watering delicacies, ensuring you'll always have a place to go when you don't feel like cooking. We also offer residents a range of amenities including a fitness center, on-site laundry facilities, on-site business center, and covered parking. Plus, our technology package, eavesConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, Amazon package lockers, electronic locks, and more. About Lake Forest, CA Lake Forest is located near the Eastern Transportation Corridors, which provide easy access to Los Angeles, San Diego, and the Inland Empire.
